resources.string: Italian Nap - Doze and wake in rural Tuscany
The sound that will put you slowly asleep:
The sound that will bring you gently back to this world:

If you want to escape to the rural fields of Tuscany for a short nap, this app is your solution. You can choose three carefully designed rural soundscapes to doze off with. After two minutes the sound will gradually fade away and the screen will turn in a dark starry night, leaving you in the arms of Morpheus.
 
Two minutes before waking time, your preferred wake up sound will slowly fade in. Finally, you are brought back to reality with your preferred wake up call and a bright screen. This final wake up call is set to maximum volume, to make sure that you will wake up indeed.
 
Check if your battery is sufficiently charged, otherwise your device will fall asleep itself and is unable to wake you!
If you have any remarks about this app, please contact the designer at: info@robertloeberdevelopment.nl
